name: autoyard-api
title: AutoYard API
description: The API endpoints for autoyard project

scripts.inst: rm -rf node_modules && rm package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.development: export PORT=3138 && export API_ENV=development && pm2 start starter.js --name autoyard-api
scripts.deploy: export PORT=3138 && export API_ENV=production && pm2 start starter.js --name autoyard-api
